data.name: Birthday present
data.description:
You and some of your friends are invited to a birthday party and you decide to buy the present together.
Laura buys a CD, Steve buys some flowers and Sophie buys a bottle of Whiskey. Afterwards you want to even the costs out.

Your task is now to calculate who owes whom how much money given an array of expenses everyone had.

Example: A pays 10€, B pays 20€ and C pays nothing. Then C has to give B 10€ to even things out.

Since the solution will not be unique it is only tested if everyone has had the same costs afterwards. Amounts of money that are less than 0.01€ can be considered zero.

To make things more interesting. The test cases will consist of up to 1e6 entries.
